text: (napiyē!) Ātamuṭaiya iru kumārarkaḷiṉ uṇmai varalāṟṟai nīr avarkaḷukku ōtikkāṇpiyum;. Avviruvarum (opvoruvarum) kurpāṉi koṭutta pōtu, oruvariṭamiruntu atu ēṟṟuk koḷḷappaṭṭatu. Maṟṟavariṭamiruntu atu ēṟṟukkoḷḷappaṭavillai. (Piṉṉavar)"nāṉ niccayamāka uṉṉaik kolai ceytu viṭuvēṉ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉār. Ataṟku (muṉṉavar)"meyyākavē allāh ēṟṟuk koḷvatu payapaktiyuṭaiyavarkaḷiṭamiruntu tāṉ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉār
